Html:
Hi again...

One more question... sorry once more for the “novice like” questions.

It is possible to put a strait line between two points? How to do it in VB2008 express?

Another question, when we put a city or an address, if we do not mention the country and if it exists another city or place with that name, well, then we must inform the user to search again putting the country or zip code. If it was possible to show in a textbox or list box the query result with all the similar occurrences concerning the address, then I thing that it was simpler to the user and more efficient.

Well, and once more, the “directions names” like in the google API?

 

 

Many thanks,

 

Luís

myltiply addresses and directions are curently in testing

p.s. you can get strait line by using two point in the MapRoute
